sentences.english: Coal bed gas parameter well SPMT-1 is located at the Shiping well field, Guxu mining area, South Sichuan Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 1號煤層氣參數井位於川南煤田古敘礦區石屏井田。

sentences.english: The coal mining area around Jiaozuo City has a history of nearly 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 焦作市煤礦區是一個有着近百年曆史的老礦區。

sentences.english: Liuzhi Coal Mine is one of the areas in South Chica where karst water harm is serious.
sentences.chinese: 六枝礦區是我國南方煤礦水害嚴重地區之一。

sentences.english: Deepen the culture of responsibility-building, to maintain harmonious and stable mining areas.
sentences.chinese: 深化責任文化建設，全力維護礦區和諧穩定。

sentences.english: The ore district is located in the inside and outside contact strips of Dayang granite body.
sentences.chinese: 礦區處於大洋花崗岩體的內外接觸帶。

sentences.english: The results of the blasting safety accident of a certain mine in Shaanxi were described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了陝西省某礦區爆破飛石傷人事故的分析結果。

sentences.english: GIS-based Digital Mine (DM) is the key on the mineral resource prediction.
sentences.chinese: 而基於GIS的數字礦區是進行礦產資源預測的關鍵。

sentences.english: In this paper, the application of ferrograph analysis technology in Shendong Colliery is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了鐵譜分析技術在神東礦區的應用情況。

sentences.english: Burning waste heap is one of the major air pollution sources in. coalmine areas.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦自燃矸石山是礦區一大污染源。

sentences.english: This is one of the only mines in the world to produce blue diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 這是世界上爲數不多生產藍鑽的礦區之一。

sentences.english: The aimed to study the effects of composted refuse on the soil chemical characters .
sentences.chinese: 研究垃圾堆肥對礦區復墾土壤化學性狀的影響。

sentences.english: The overprinted part of the early and late stages is the ore shoot part in the ore area.
sentences.chinese: 早晚兩期成礦疊加部位構成礦區內富礦段。

sentences.english: Support of soft rock was a difficult problem in support of sinking and driving in Huainan mining area.
sentences.chinese: 軟巖支護一直是困擾淮南礦區巷道支護的一大難題。

sentences.english: Mine soil-reclaimed is one of comprehensive key research field in the world.
sentences.chinese: 礦區土壤復墾是國際上備受關注的研究領域。

sentences.english: Slow fault structure is commonly developed in every mining area or mining well in Longyong Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 緩斷裂構造普遍發育於龍永煤田各個礦區或井田。

sentences.english: Deploy Emissary near your Expansion Field and wait for it to deploy.
sentences.chinese: 在分礦區部署勘探車並且等待他部署。
